import React, { Component } from "react"; import Header from "./NavComponents/navigation"; import searchIcon from "../images/search_icon.png"; import axios from "axios"; class ArticleContents extends Component { state = { ArticleItems: [] }; componentDidMount() { this.getArticleItems(); } getArticleItems() { axios .get(`http://localhost:8888/api/articles/`) .then((res) => { this.setState({ ArticleItems: res.data }); }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); } render() { let test = this.state.ArticleItems.filter(ArticleItems=>ArticleItems.title==="White hair, it could be your body giving you alerts") return (
{this.state.test.map((item) => (

{item.title}

{item.content}

))}
